sentences.sContent: He challenged the political orthodoxy of his time.
sentences.sCn: 他对同时代的正统政治观念提出了质疑。

sentences.sContent: These ideas have now become part of educational orthodoxy.
sentences.sCn: 这些观点现已成为正统教育理念的一部分。

trans.tranOther: an idea or set of ideas that is accepted by most people to be correct and right
